Package com.clientwallet.validation

Annotation Interface ValidCurrency

@Target({FIELD,PARAMETER}) @Retention(RUNTIME) @Constraint(validatedBy=CurrencyValidator.class) public @interface ValidCurrency
Custom annotation used to validate Currency values.

This annotation is used in combination with the CurrencyValidator to ensure that a field or parameter is a valid Currency enum value. It can be applied to fields and parameters and will trigger the validation process when validated.

See Also:
  • CurrencyValidator

    Optional Elements
    Modifier and Type
    Optional Element
    Description
    Class<?>[]
    groups
    Groups can be used to apply different validation rules to different validation groups.
    String
    message
    The default error message that will be shown when the validation fails.
    Class<? extends jakarta.validation.Payload>[]
    payload
    The payload allows additional data to be carried with the annotation.

  • Element Details

    • message

      String message
      The default error message that will be shown when the validation fails.
      Returns:
      The default error message.
      Default:
      "Invalid currency type"

    • groups

      Class<?>[] groups
      Groups can be used to apply different validation rules to different validation groups.
      Returns:
      The groups that this constraint belongs to.
      Default:
      {}

    • payload

      Class<? extends jakarta.validation.Payload>[] payload
      The payload allows additional data to be carried with the annotation.
      Returns:
      The payload associated with the annotation.
      Default:
      {}
